title: Interpretation of a dream about wearing a robe in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing wearing a dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing wearing a dress in a dream is evidence of charitable and righteous deeds, and God knows best. Also, dreaming of a person wearing a jacket indicates stopping worries and sorrows and turning to God Almighty and making things easier for the dreamer. Also, seeing a person wearing a jacket indicates stopping worries and sorrows and turning to God Almighty and making things easier for the dreamer. Wearing a robe in a dream may indicate the happiness that the dreamer will experience and faith in God, and the oneness of God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a robe for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a vision of wearing a robe, this indicates the collapse of her worries and the achievement of her desired goals and aspirations. Also, the vision of wearing an abaya in The dream of an unmarried girl may indicate her faith in God Almighty and that difficult matters will be made easy and she will overcome them. Seeing wearing a robe in a dream may indicate self-development and the desire to do new things that the girl will be happy to achieve, and God knows best. Seeing wearing a robe in a dream for an unmarried girl may indicate To the death of her worries and her close marriage to a good and handsome young man who obeys God. A bathrobe in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams of wearing a robe or buying a robe, this means that she will achieve goals and achieve success and excellence in the lives of her children. Also, seeing a woman wearing a robe in a dream may indicate The collapse of the disputes that arise between her and her husband, a high standard of living, and an abundance of halal money. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a robe or a veil, this indicates her faith in God Almighty and repentance from sins. Interpretation of seeing wearing a robe in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman dreams By wearing the abaya, this indicates the disappearance of her worries and sorrows and a return to God Almighty, and the ease of the coming matters. Also, seeing her wearing the abaya may indicate the progress of her future children, their ease and the nearness of their time, and the birth of a child free of all illness, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a man wearing a robe in a dream: If A compassionate man sees in his dream that he says that he is wearing the robe of a family member, then this indicates deceit by his friends or his sister, and God knows best. Also, to see yourself wearing a robe in a dream can indicate self-development and the desire for something new to happen and to enter into a new job. This vision also shows the achievement of goals and the dreamer’s abundant livelihood, and his intimate marriage to a righteous and religious girl, and God knows best. Seeing him wearing a robe in a dream may indicate success in the married man’s life, the success of his children in school, and the death of many quarrels. If you have a dream that you want to interpret Leave it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about Friday in a dream and its interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about Friday in a dream: It is certain that Friday is one of the best days of the week, in addition to mentioning many Qur’anic verses and noble prophetic hadiths about its value. It should be noted that Muslims on this day in particular gather in their mosques to perform Friday prayers, and there is no doubt that Friday With its events and details, it interferes with people’s sleep, so they seek to know the interpretation of that, and in this article we will explain the interpretation of a dream about Friday in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about Friday by Ibn Sirin The great commentators presented and explained many interpretations and implications related to seeing Friday in a dream, other than seeing the details of that day, and this The interpretation is as follows: Ibn Sirin believes that a dream about Friday is undoubtedly an indication that the dreamer’s separate affairs will meet and unite. While the Friday prayer in the dream specifically indicates that difficult matters will inevitably become easier. Also, Friday in a dream, it carries a sign that indicates To travel. Moreover, the dreamer will enjoy this trip and will also have a lot of sustenance. Also, a dream about Friday in the dreamer definitely indicates the path of imminent relief. In addition, Friday in a dream can also indicate the presence of joys and joy. As A dream about Friday symbolizes the required request, God willing, as well as the achievement of goals. Interpretation of a dream about Friday in a dream. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the muezzin in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of Friday for a single girl. There are many visions and dreams that occur in the dream of an unmarried girl, causing her confusion and anxiety. Among these dreams is a dream on Friday, and its interpretation is as follows: A dream on Friday for an unmarried girl indicates her approaching marriage and connection. This also indicates that there is an atmosphere of joy and joy inside her home to celebrate engagement and marriage. In addition, a dream on Friday may indicate for a girl She is not married to meet her friends and share in her joy. If Friday is accompanied by pleasant weather and a bright sun. This may indicate the success of this girl and her success in her scientific career and throughout her life. However, if the weather accompanying Friday in a dream is dark, the vision may not bode well. With goodness. This dream indicates that the righteous are gathering in her house due to the occurrence of calamity or distress. In addition, this vision may indicate the presence of difficulty in some matters in his life. Interpretation of a dream about Friday in a dream. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a woman leading a woman to pray in a dream. Interpretation Friday for a married woman: A woman often sees dreams in her dreams, as some of these dreams have an impact on the woman, and one of these dreams is a dream on Friday, and the interpretation of the dream is as follows: A dream on Friday for a married woman indicates her salvation and the end of a period during which she suffered from fatigue. In general, it indicates A dream about Friday in a married woman’s dream indicates comfort and an answer to prayer. Also, this dream carries a sign that the situation will change from difficulty to ease. Whereas if a married woman sees that her wedding is coming

title: Interpretation of a dream about makeup “make-up” in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about grooming in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Today on the Moments website, we present to you what is new and distinctive in this article, the interpretation of seeing a dream with good quality, the dream of grooming in a dream, interpretation of Surat Al-Nabulsi, to see the meaning of grooming in a dream, the meaning of a dream of grooming in a dream. You can also see: Interpretation of a dream about the sound of a snake Interpretation of a dream about grooming in a dream by Ibn Sirini Dream interpretation jurists say that if a woman sees in her dream that she adorns herself and puts on full makeup in her dream and appears very beautifully. This indicates that this woman has high morals, beauty and purity and that she is very kind in Her dealings with others and her good behavior. If a woman sees that she is wearing a large amount of makeup, this indicates that this woman lives very happily. And that she hears very good news that will make her heart happy and fulfill all her desires. Interpretation of a dream about grooming in a dream for a man. Ibn Sirin says if one sees himself In a dream, he is wearing makeup and cosmetics during his sleep. This suggests that this person is hiding many of the secrets that make him happy from those close to him for fear of envy. It also indicates that this person does not want to reveal his personal life in front of others. As for the case of the man, he sees in a dream that His wife brags about her beauty, and Ibn Shirin says: This indicates that this man loves his wife madly and adores her very much, and that this woman is a good woman. But Satan is trying to plant doubt in her husband’s heart to separate him from his wife and destroy happy homes. A person should not respond to such visions. Interpretation of seeing makeup in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen says: If a man dreams that he is wearing cosmetics. This vision on his face shows that he is trying to hide a lot of flaws and trying not to show a certain thing in front of others. If you see your boss at work or the governor of the state wearing makeup, this means This person is unfair and treats people very harshly, but he is trying to beautify and hide many facts. Seeing the husband wearing makeup in his house means that there are many disputes and problems that may lead to divorce or may indicate a serious illness of the husband. Seeing the application of kohl in the eyes is considered Good visions show that the dreamer has keen insight and the ability to see things very clearly. The vision of buying makeup, whether for men or women, means that there are many positive changes in life and means more happiness, sophistication, and great prosperity in life. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream She wears makeup in large quantities and excessively. This vision shows that the unmarried girl is suffering from a loss of interest and is trying to draw the attention of others to her in any way. Seeing yourself buying makeup from an unmarried girl is a sign of marrying a rich man. But if you see that she She became ugly after makeup. This means that the girl is trying to deceive those around her and prove to them that she is a good person. Seeing a pregnant woman wearing makeup means that she is very stressed and worried about the birth order. Seeing a married woman wearing a lot

title: Interpretation of seeing a beard in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a beard in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, the beard is considered one of the distinctive features that appears on the features and faces of men and changes their appearance to a great extent. And the life of the seer. Many are interested in knowing the interpretation of a beard in a dream. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a beard in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a beard in a dream. Interpretation by Ibn Sirin. A long and well-groomed beard shows what the fortuneteller will receive in terms of money and a lot of money. Goodness in the coming period. A long beard shows the dreamer’s strength and chivalry. Shaving its neck in a dream symbolizes the pains and troubles that the dreamer is exposed to, but God Almighty will remove him from them sooner or later. While the mustache attached to the beard symbolizes the dreamer’s adherence to morals and customs and his willingness to please God Almighty. Shaving A mustache in a dream indicates marriage to an unmarried person and the recovery of the sick person, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a beard in a dream for a single woman: This dream can be in two cases, one of which is to see a beard growing on her face and the other is to see it on the face of a man she knows or does not know. We will present all of these interpretations in the following paragraph: The growth of a beard on the face of an unmarried woman in a dream indicates that she will be exposed to some troubles and problems that will cause her distress. If the beard is shaved from her face in a dream, it is a good omen that she will get rid of the difficulties she is going through and that what follows will be in the future. Her life is better by God’s will. Seeing an old man with a beard in a dream is a sign of her need to repent and not commit sin or transgression. Seeing a young man who knows a girl with a beard in a dream means that she will marry him soon, while seeing a beard on the face of a man she does not know indicates the emergence of happy circumstances. In her life, whether it was work. Or marriage. An unmarried woman asked her fiancé to shave his beard in a dream as a sign of failure and the end of this relationship, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a beard in a dream for a married woman. In the following points we explain the effects of seeing a married woman with a beard in a dream: Seeing a beard on her face indicates The existence of some disputes between her and her husband or problems related to children. A married woman who shaves her beard from her face in a dream is considered good news about the end of her worries and the difficulties that she and her family are going through. The beard on the husband’s face in the wife’s dream is evidence of the well-being and luxury that she is experiencing, while shaving His beard is an evil omen that symbolizes the loss of money and debts, God forbid. And if the married woman was pregnant at the time she saw the dream, then this is good news for the birth of a good person with a happy future, and that God will give birth to her easily by His command, and praise be to God. His.Interpretation of the dream of seeing a man with a white beard in a dream. Therefore, the dream has different interpretations, which we present in the following points: The graying of his beard in a dream for a person with a black beard in reality symbolizes the honor and dignity he enjoys and the respect of those around him. Mixing black hair with a gray beard foretells the dreamer’s sin and that he He may repent or be exposed to some health problems, but he will recover sooner by God’s will.

title: Interpretation of dream about bracelets in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing bracelets in a dream for a man, a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. We will learn about different visions and their interpretation, such as seeing a broken gold bracelet, as bracelets in a dream have different meanings, such as those that express goodness, such as a lost bracelet in a dream. You may also know about entering the house of the dead In a dream. It can express unpleasant news. We will try to shed light on some visions of bracelets in a dream and their interpretations by Ibn Sirin and the most important dream interpretation scholars. Others were seen by the dreamer only before consulting a specialized dream interpretation world. Read also: Toilet in a dreamInterpretation of seeing bracelets in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing bracelets in a dreamIbn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing bracelets in a dream is a praiseworthy dream, most of which have a good meaning, and portend the dreamer following a diet Wide and good. It also says that a white bracelet in a dream indicates good news that the dreamer hears or happy circumstances that will occur. As for a colored bracelet in a dream, this may be a sign of good luck and getting rid of the fears that the dreamer was suffering from. Wearing a gold bracelet In a dream, one of the visions that heralds the stability of life and the improvement of the dreamer’s condition for the better. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Seeing bracelets in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she is wearing a gold bracelet, this may mean that the date of marriage is approaching - God willing -. As for seeing An unmarried girl buys a bracelet in a dream, as this indicates the joy and happiness that the girl feels and the happy times that she will receive. Wearing a fire bracelet in a dream, whether for a girl or for a single man, this may be a sign of witchcraft and envy, God forbid. Read also: The penguin in Dreaming about seeing bracelets in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees golden bracelets in a dream. This may be one of the indicators of the huge commission that she will receive - God willing -. Also, this may be an indicator of the many blessings and abundant goodness that she will receive. Likewise, wearing bracelets in a married woman’s dream It is a sign of the friendship and love that a married woman lives with her husband. As for the gift of bracelets in a married woman’s dream, it indicates the end of problems and disagreements with her husband, God willing. Read also: Washing the dead. Seeing bracelets in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she is wearing white bracelets. This may be a sign that she will give birth easily and naturally, with which she will not face any problems - God willing. Also, gold bracelets in a pregnant woman’s dream could be a harbinger that she will give birth to a male child, and God knows best. As for silver bracelets in a pregnant woman’s dream, they may be a sign of That she will give birth to a girl, and God knows best. Seeing bracelets in a man’s dream A man who sees gold bracelets in a dream is considered an unpleasant dream that indicates that the dreamer is characterized by deception and lies. Also, silver bracelets in a man’s dream can be a sign of achieving a higher rank and promotion at work. a

title: Interpretation of seeing a pig in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: I like fansSubscribersFansInterpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi Seeing a pig in a dream symbolizes bad habits and forbidden money obtained illegally. Interpretation of seeing a pig in a dream for a single woman symbolizes Seeing a pig in the dream of an unmarried girl means that there is a fraud, a liar and a hypocrite who charms her and approaches her. Looking at a pig in a dream means that you will be injured and in danger. But if an unmarried girl sees a wild boar chasing her in a dream, this indicates a feeling of fear and anxiety towards people who talk about her and look at her with contempt and envy. The dream of eating pork in a dream indicates that the unmarried woman is walking on the wrong path and moving away from God Almighty. title: The correct interpretation of the dream of slippers, as narrated by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about slippers in a dream: Slippers, slippers, or slippers are a type of light shoes that people wear in neighborhoods and slum areas. Soles are made of leather, rubber or plastic. Seeing them in a dream is one of the common visions that some believe has no explanation. On the contrary, we find a lot of evidence as to what the slippers symbolize, according to many important details in the dreamer’s dream, so what do they symbolize? Interpretation of the dream of the slippers in a dream. The slippers in the dream symbolize a bad situation, poverty, the absence of wonderful opportunities that await the dreamer, and the great pressure that is exerted on him. It also symbolizes failure. The pretext in romantic relationships and disagreements that show the extent of the difference between the two partners and the inability to understand or match many spiritual and life visions. If the slippers are beautiful, this indicates deceptive appearances, love of flattery, engaging in questionable actions and entering into unsafe relationships with consequences. If he sees in a dream that he is wearing slippers, this means arduous journeys, a difficult life, and constant moving from one place to another in search of suitable opportunities. The slippers symbolize an obedient servant, wife, or the means that the dreamer uses to reach his goals or the places he wishes to go to. It also symbolizes To estrangement. And if he sees that his slippers have been stolen, this indicates extreme anxiety and distress, and he lives in misery and anxiety. Slippers are the tool that provides a man with safety from the traps of the road, but if they are lost. By him, this is a sign of the loss or loss of a loved one or separation. Buying slippers symbolizes poverty or a relationship with a well-off man. If he sees that his slippers fell into the sea or water in general, this indicates that the term is approaching a person close to him who may Be the wife. Slippers in a dream. If the slippers were previously used or pierced due to repeated use, this indicates a person who has had previous relationships. If the slippers are not suitable for walking or have cuts, this indicates the presence of obstacles that prevent him from the things he intended to do. He may The dream is as if he is prohibited from traveling or that he heard certain news that prevents him. From completing the procedures he took regarding withdrawal. It is said: Whoever wears sandals or sandals on his feet and does not walk in them: this is a sign of marriage with a woman. And if he sees that he is puncturing his shoes or sandals, this is evidence that he overlooks his wife’s faults and improves his condition with her and coexistence with her. To commit sins. And if he sees that he is walking in shoes, this indicates loss or separation, because it indicates the loss of things that were not completed to the end. If the viewer is fascinated by the beauty of the shoes, this is a sign of the need to be careful in dealing with others and beware of the person who enchants him and causes him to approach Attitudes towards him. Psychology believes that seeing ugly or worn out slippers or shoes indicates a person who does not accept criticism with open arms, refuses to be fair with others in his actions, and does not respond to commands or advice directed at him, which warns him that people will not do so. Love it and turn them into a

title: Interpretation of a dream about a chair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a chair in a dream: Since dreaming of a chair has many interpretations, we will try to collect some of them in the following lines with conclusions from some of the most important interpretation scholars such as Muhammad ibn Sirin, but no one who saw a chair in a dream should conclude that we may also be interested in knowing the letter Thaa in a dream. With the interpretations that we will mention, these interpretations are not only known to the thing, but in order to derive an interpretation, this must be done by a distinguished scientist in the field of dream interpretation so that he can determine all the circumstances. From the dreamer and the ability to investigate well and ask the required questions through which the correct interpretation of the vision is made. If the man sees a lot of chairs during sleep, this indicates that this man will marry more than one person, or he may work in more than one job, or he may have more than one skill. If a girl sees a lot of chairs, this indicates that there are many people who want to marry her. If he sees during his sleep an execution chair or a chair prepared for death, this does not bode well at all. If the dreamer is a merchant or businessman, this will make him fail and lose, and the matter may reach the point of declaring bankruptcy, but if the dreamer is a student, this means that he will fail. If someone sees the confessor while he is sleeping, this indicates that the dreamer will get involved in legal problems and appear before a judge. Coming soon.Interpretation of seeing a chair in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that the meaning of a chair in a dream is liberation and victory over others, in addition to that it can indicate a good ending. Ibn Sirin also believes that the interpretation of seeing a chair in a dream for an unmarried girl is that it promises her marriage. As for seeing a chair in a sick person’s dream, this is an undesirable dream. Likewise, when a pregnant woman in a dream sees an obstetrician sitting in a chair, this indicates the pain and suffering of childbirth. Seeing a chair in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a chair in a dream for an unmarried girl who dreams that she is sitting On a wooden chair, this is a good omen for the girl who will get married soon. As for seeing a golden chair in a dream, or seeing a throne chair, this indicates the religiosity of the girl who is dreaming, high or pure. Seeing a chair in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees a chair in a dream, This indicates the benefits that a married woman will receive from her husband. Also, the interpretation of seeing a chair in a dream for a married woman who sees that she is buying a chair in a dream, this may be a sign that she will move to a new house. A golden chair in a married woman’s dream or a silver chair From people that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. Seeing a chair in a dream for a pregnant woman. When a pregnant woman dreams of a chair, this indicates an obstetrician or obstetrician. As for an iron chair in a pregnant woman’s dream, this portends a remembrance of her, God willing, and God knows best. Seeing it falling from a chair in a dream when she sees If you fall from a chair in a dream, this is one of the unwanted dreams that indicate weakness, laziness, failure, or inability to achieve goals. maybe

title: Interpretation of Ihram in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Ihram in a dream. Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing Ihram in a dream by performing the rituals of Hajj or Umrah as an indication of the marriage of an unmarried person. If the visionary is a married man, this indicates divorce. If the dreamer is sick, he will die. If he is one of the evil people, he will strive for jihad and integrity to obtain forbidden things. If The dreamer saw that he was being respected outside of the times of Hajj or Ihram, then this indicates darkness on his face. Whoever saw this in his dream was respectable and had a brown face. As for showing nudity, it indicates that he is one of evil people and fights forbidden things. Different interpretations of it. Ihram dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he is fishing Whatever God forbids him from hunting him in the ihram and killing him, this indicates that he will be fined in reality because he was killed in the dream. Seeing a husband and his wife wearing the ihram clothes and being deprived of them together, this indicates separation and divorce between them. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen on seeing the ihram in a dream. Ibn Shaheen interpreted the dream of the ihram as An indication that the dreamer has stripped himself of worship and committed a sin. Dreaming of Ihram in a dream and its interpretation. Ihram is wearing pure white clothing to perform the rituals of Hajj or Umrah, and dreaming of wearing Ihram has many meanings. It can indicate the emotional life of the dreamer, as interpreters say that seeing Ihram In a dream for one person, it indicates marriage and stability. It has negative connotations. The dreamer is a married man, and respecting his wife, this indicates a divorce between them. Interpreters interpreted seeing the ihram in a dream of a sick man on the verge of death, and God knows best. Wearing the ihram in a dream has many meanings. Wearing it in reality indicates one’s desire. In getting closer to God Almighty, piety and faith, but in a dream it indicates committing sin and the desire to be cleansed from it. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing Ihram in a dream Ibn Shirin interpreted seeing Ihram in a dream as an indication of abstaining from intercourse and its reasons. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations About seeing Ihram in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we take your comments at the end of the article and we will give you the interpretation as soon as possible.

title: Learn more about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing Christians in a dream

preview.html: The words of Ibn Sirin in interpreting the appearance of Christians in a dream. There are three heavenly religions known to everyone, which are Judaism, Christianity, and then Islam, which is the conclusion of the three religions. Read below. The Christian in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Sins and disobedience. One of the most important meanings of a Muslim dreamer’s dream is that he is a Christian in the dream. If the dreamer is a man who believes in God and sees In a dream that he is a Christian, this expresses an inheritance that will soon become the dreamer’s share. If the dreamer is a devout Muslim and sees a Christian in his dream, this explains that the dreamer has enemies, but he will take them all and this dream confirms that the dreamer has never entered into the fear of his heart and always faces his enemies. . With absolute courage. The appearance of a priest in a Muslim dream represents a harmful enemy in the dreamer’s life who wants to take him away. When the dreamer dreams of a dead person he knows, and this dead person converted to the Islamic religion, but he appeared in a dream among Christians, this interprets that the dead person was not ready to meet God and died, and committed a sin. Great, and he came to the dreamer in his sleep until he saved him from God’s punishment with supplication and charity. Interpretation of a Christian vision in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The presence of a Christian woman he knows in a dream who entered the shrine to visit the Kaaba, this dream interprets that that woman changed her religion and embraced Islam, but she feels afraid of those around her Thus, she tries to take the mosque to protect her until she enters it and feels safe inside. A Christian woman in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s imminent victory over all his enemies. If the dreamer enters the church with a Christian woman, then this dream shows the shameful behaviors that the dreamer performs in reality and will not recognize that they are against Sharia law. And society. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search for the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a Muslim’s vision for a Christian. If the dreamer dreams of a Christian entering the mosque and standing on the pulpit until he leads an imam with the believers present in the mosque, then this dream is an indicator There will be great strife in the country or a catastrophe will occur. . In the dreamer’s life. When a Muslim dreams of a Christian holding an important Islamic position, as if he has become a famous Islamic preacher or a well-known cleric, the vision indicates sects that will spread throughout the entire country. Interpretation of seeing a Christian in a dream Ibn Shaheen said that Christianity in a dream is good evidence and a near victory that satisfies The dreamer. If the dreamer sees a woman whose religion is Christian in the dream, this means that he will quarrel with someone, but this quarrel or hostility will not cause him any harm. If the Christian dreamer sees in his dream a Christian woman who changed her religion and converted to Islam, this means that the dreamer will either change His religion is from Christianity to Islam or he will die soon. If the dreamer sees Christianity inside the mosque and leading Muslims, then this dream is very bad, and expresses a misfortune that will suddenly fall upon the dreamer, and he must bear it and be patient until he is rewarded. For this patience. If a Christian woman dreams that she changed her religion and embraced another religion different from hers, this is interpreted as a lady whose behavior is bad and far from religion and morals. When a woman dreams of
